The Agriculture High School of Beir-Tuvia 1967-1970 Military Service, Israel Defence Forces 1970-1973 B.Sc. studies (Biology), The Hebrew University of Jerusalem 1973 B.Sc. degree (with distinction) 1974-1978 Ph.D. studies (Biochemistry) (in direct program for 10 top students), Dept. of Biological Chemistry, The Hebrew University of Jerusalem.
